reasons.header: Why couldn't you collect your BRP?

nominated.header: Who was supposed to collect your BRP on your behalf?
nominated.description: Provide details of the person who tried to collect the BRP on your behalf

where.header: From where were you asked to collect your BRP?
where.description: This could have been from a Post Office branch or a sponsor, such as your legal representative, employer, university or school.
where.date-question: If you have attempted to collect your BRP, when was it? (optional)

contact-details.header: How should we contact you about your BRP?

address.title: What address should we use to contact you by post?

personal-details.subheader: We need these details to process your request.

check-details.header: Check the details you have provided
check-details.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

org-help.title: Are you completing this form on behalf of the BRP holder?
org-help.explanation: Friends, relatives, employers, charity workers and lawyers, for example, can complete this form on behalf of the BRP holder.

footer.title: Send us your details
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions.

check-details-error.header: Check the details you have provided
check-details-error.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you provided to

para.one: We will review the information you have provided to find out why there was a problem with your BRP collection.
para.two: We investigate each case individually and will respond to you as soon as possible - within 5 working days.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, We will tell you if you need to apply for a replacement BRP.
We will contact you in the next working day to tell you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK, you may need to apply for a temporary visa to get back to the UK.
para.three: We will tell you if you need to apply for a temporary visa when we contact you.

someone-else-confirmation.paragraph: We will review the information you have provided and investigate the situation.
